name: Medieval Rat Assassin Simulator
description:
If you're havin' trouble running the game, try another browser!

Hi, hi!

Here's a little somethin' I've been workin on in my spare time! 

Hope you guys will have some fun with it!

Explore an afternoon in the life of Velma, the heroine of 'To All The Wolves I've
Slain'!

Warning 

This game is a product of time spent learning how to develop games with Unity, so it is an educational project and as such misses a lot of features that a 'complete' game is considered to have... but if you like silly endless (almost) combat with waves of rats, I've got you covered, heheh!


Thanks!

A huge thanks and a shout out to everyone from 'To All The Wolves I've Slain'!

And a big thank you to Legnops for designing the character sprite!

Controls

A - left;  

D - right; 

E/LMB - swing; 

F - dash;  

Space - jump;
